title: [build] DEBUG=1 turns on device debug symbols in NCCL
body_html:
I built with DEBUG=1, which should only add debug symbols to host functions. CUDA_DEBUG=1 is the flag that adds device debug symbols. But I got:

[1576/2332] Performing build step for 'nccl_external'
Grabbing  src/nccl.h                          > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/include/nccl.h
Compiling src/libwrap.cu                      > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/libwrap.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
Compiling src/core.cu                         > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/core.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
Compiling src/all_gather.cu                   > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/all_gather.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored

cc @teng-li

Not a big deal though.

body:
I built with DEBUG=1, which should only add debug symbols to host functions. CUDA_DEBUG=1 is the flag that adds device debug symbols. But I got:
```
[1576/2332] Performing build step for 'nccl_external'
Grabbing  src/nccl.h                          > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/include/nccl.h
Compiling src/libwrap.cu                      > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/libwrap.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
Compiling src/core.cu                         > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/core.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option

ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
Compiling src/all_gather.cu                   > /scratch/ssnl/sftp/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/all_gather.o
nvcc warning : '--device-debug (-G)' overrides '--generate-line-info (-lineinfo)'
ptxas warning : Conflicting options --device-debug and --generate-line-info specified, ignoring --generate-line-info option
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored

```

cc @teng-li 

Not a big deal though.
